name: Sokoban (but you move the warehouse, not the guy)
name_original: Sokoban (but you move the warehouse, not the guy)
description:
It the game of Sokoban, or at least one level of it that I found online.

But you don't move the guy. You move and rotate the whole warehouse AROUND the guy.

Still plays the same, but thinking about things this way is an interesting problem.

The game, while using a graphical UI drawn with SDL, mostly behaves like a terminal application, and the controls are numeric menus. I do this on purpose, because it is the most accessible UI on the planet.

You can find the source code at https://github.com/playdeezgames/TGGD_sdldiscordjam1
